short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to customize YouTube layout. Currently, there is only a function to swap the video area and comment area.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is an extension that customizes the YouTube layout. Currently, there is a function to swap the video area and the comment area, and users watching the live broadcast can change the layout as they like.
